Name: Set Faction
Description: Sets faction of creature
Param1Tooltip: Id from Faction.dbc
Param2Tooltip: enum TemporaryFactionFlags

Name: Morph to Entry or Model
Description: Sets model of creature from creature_template entry or explicit modelId
Param1Tooltip: Entry from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Explicit modelId from creature_model_info

Name: Play sound
Description: Plays sound from SoundEntries.dbc
Param1Tooltip: SoundId from SoundEntries.dbc

Name: Play emote
Description: Plays emote from Emotes.dbc
Param1Tooltip: EmoteId from Emotes.dbc

Name: Play random sound
Description: Plays random sound
Param1Tooltip: SoundId from SoundEntries.dbc
Param2Tooltip: SoundId from SoundEntries.dbc

Name: Play random emote
Description: Plays random emote
Param1Tooltip: EmoteId from Emotes.dbc
Param2Tooltip: EmoteId from Emotes.dbc

Name: Cast spell
Description: Casts spell at target with given flags
Param1Tooltip: SpellId from spell_template
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Spawn temporary spawn
Description: Spawns a temporary creature in combat - for scripted events use spell or spawn_group instead
Param1Tooltip: Entry from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param3Tooltip: Duration until the summoned creature is unsummoned after combat ends

Name: Modify threat of target
Description: Modifies threat of a single target
Param1Tooltip: Modifier to the threat
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param3Tooltip: When 0, used as percentage. -100 removes all threat and -101 removes ref from threatlist. When 1 used as normal value.

Name: Modify all threat
Description: Modifies all threat on the threatlist
Param1Tooltip: The percent that is used to modify everyones threat list. -101 removes everything from threatlist.

Name: Quest expored event
Description: Satisfies exploration completion requirement of a quest
Param1Tooltip: Quest Id which should have exploration completed
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param3Tooltip: If set to 1, whole targets group is given credit

Name: Set unit flag
Description: Sets flags to targets unit flags
Param1Tooltip: Flags that will be set. enum UnitFlags
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Remove unit flag
Description: Removes flags from targets unit flags
Param1Tooltip: Flags that will be removed. enum UnitFlags
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Enable/Disable auto attack
Description: Enables or disables auto attacking automatically in combat.
Param1Tooltip: If 0, turns off, if 1, turns on auto attacking in combat.

Name: Enable/Disable combat movement
Description: Enables or disables chasing in combat towards its victim.
Param1Tooltip: If 0, turns off, if 1, turns on chasing after main aggro target.

Name: Set AI phase
Description: Sets AI phase to specific value
Param1Tooltip: Phase value to be set. Integer between 0 and 31

Name: Increment AI phase
Description: Increases or decreases AI phase value
Param1Tooltip: Value by which to increase or decrease current phase value

Name: Evade
Description: Drops combat and evades home
Param1Tooltip: If set to 1, only drops combat and does not move home. Only use this when its verified to drop combat.

Name: Flee for assist
Description: Flees from combat to acquire assistance against foes

Name: Quest explored event for group
Description: Completes quest explored condition for everyone eligible
Param1Tooltip: Quest Id from quest_template
Param2Tooltip: When set to 1, only completes quest for players on threatlist. Otherwise uses action invoker.

Name: Remove auras due to spell
Description: Removes all auras due to spell from given target
Param1Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param2Tooltip: Spell Id from spell_template to which the auras belong

Name: Set random AI phase
Description: Sets random phase from parameters
Param1Tooltip: Random phase of choice
Param2Tooltip: Random phase of choice

Name: Set random AI phase range
Description: Sets the new phase in range from phaseMin <= newPhase <= phaseMax
Param1Tooltip: Minimum of the phase range
Param2Tooltip: Maximum of the phase range

Name: Target killed creature credit
Description: Awards killed creature credit to chosen target
Param1Tooltip: Creature Id from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Set instance data
Description: Sets data for the current instance. Will only work when inside a scripted instance and is used to pass data along to C++ script.
Param1Tooltip: Field valid for C++ script of instance
Param2Tooltip: Data to be sent for given field

Name: Set instance data64
Description: Sets GUID data for the instance based on the selected target
Param1Tooltip: Field valid for C++ script of instance
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Update template
Description: Updates creature template to new creature template based on param1 Id
Param1Tooltip: Creature Id from creature_template

Name: Suicide
Description: AI creature kills itself - only use this if no instakill spell is found for script or other mechanism isnt used (actual damage)

Name: Zone combat pulse
Description: Places all players within instance in combat with the creature. Works only inside instances.

Name: Call for help
Description: AI creature calls for help from any eligible friendlies within range
Param1Tooltip: Radius for search for friendlies

Name: Set sheath state
Description: Sets sheath state for AI creature
Param1Tooltip: 0 = SHEATH_STATE_UNARMED, 1 = SHEATH_STATE_MELEE, 2 = SHEATH_STATE_RANGED

Name: Forced despawn
Description: Forces the creature to despawn after delay expires
Param1Tooltip: Time in miliseconds after which creature despawns.

Name: Set death prevention
Description: Enables or disables death prevention - HP stops at 1 and is unable to die without instakill/suicide
Param1Tooltip: 0: Turns off death prevention, 1: Turns on death prevention and/or resets triggering of death prevented event

Name: Mount to entry or model
Description: Mounts creature to resulting model
Param1Tooltip: Mounts creature to creature from creature_template
Param2Tooltip: Uses model Id from creature_model_info directly for mounting

Name: Throw AI event around
Description: Throws AI event around in radius to friendlies. Sender is AI creature, Receiver is target friendly, Invoker is selected based on Target
Param1Tooltip: enum AIEventType that was received. Supported types see CreatureAI.h enum AIEventType
Param2Tooltip: Range for selecting nearby friendly creatures to throw to
Param3Tooltip: Thrown event uses target as invoker

Name: Set throw AI event mask
Description: Sets mask that specifies which events to throw automatically
Param1Tooltip: See larger documentation as this is a bit of an obscure event

Name: Set stand state
Description: Sets stand state of AI creature
Param1Tooltip: enum UnitStandStateType

Name: Change movement type
Description: Changes current movement executed by creature
Param1Tooltip: 0: Idle, 1: Random, 2: Waypoint, 3: Path, 4: Linear
Param2Tooltip: For random - wander distance, for 2,3,4 - PathId

Name: Set react state
Description: Sets react state that determines automatic reactions of AI creature
Param1Tooltip: 0: Passive, 1: Defensive, 2: Aggresive. Default behavior is Aggresive.

Name: Pause waypoints
Description: Pauses waypoint until unpaused
Param1Tooltip: 0: Unpause, 1: Pause

Name: Interrupt spell
Description: Interrupts given spell type
Param1Tooltip: 0: CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL, 1: CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, 2: CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL, 3: CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL

Name: Start relay script
Description: Starts a relay script with given targets
Param1Tooltip: dbscripts_on_relay ID if > 0, if < 0 dbscript_random_template relay template
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Display text
Description: Displays text from creature towards target
Param1Tooltip: Text Id to be spoken - broadcast_text table
Param2Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param3Tooltip: dbscript_random_template text template which chooses random text instead

Name: Attack start
Description: Starts attack against target
Param1Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h

Name: Despawn guardians
Description: Despawns currently spawned guardians owned by AI creature
Param1Tooltip: Optional CreatureId of specific guardian to be despawned from creature_template

Name: Set ranged mode
Description: Starts ranged mode for creature (or also called caster mode) which handles AI functions of casters automatically (distancing, meleeing, rooted behaviour)
Param1Tooltip: 0: None (Turned off), 1: Full caster(melee when oom), 2: Proximity(Melee when close), 3: NoMelee, 4: Distancer(periodically tries to distance, rare)

Name: Set walk mode
Description: Sets walk mode for AI creature
Param1Tooltip: 0: RUN_DEFAULT, 1: WALK_DEFAULT(default OOC), 2: RUN_CHASE(default combat), 3: WALK_CHASE

Name: Set facing
Description: Either sets facing towards target, or resets facing towards last waypoint or towards respawn position
Param1Tooltip: Target from enum Target in CreatureEventAI.h
Param2Tooltip: 0: sets to target, 1: resets to last waypoint or respawn

Name: Set spell set
Description: Sets new creature spell set
Param1Tooltip: Set Id from creature_spell_list

Name: Set immobilized state
Description: Immobilizes creature - generally used during script when in flight or for stationary npcs - canons
Param1Tooltip: Applies or unapplies immobilized state
Param2Tooltip: If set, immobilize is removed on evade - necessary for some scripts to properly return home

Name: Set despawn aggregation
Description: Starts aggregating own spawns (from spells or temp summon commands) and despawns them on specific event
Param1Tooltip: 0x1 - enabled, 0x2 - despawn on evade, 0x4 - despawn on death
Param2Tooltip: Only despawns given entry rather than everything
Param3Tooltip: Only despawns given entry rather than everything

Name: Set immunity set
Description: Sets new immunity set
Param1Tooltip: Set Id from creature_immunities table

Name: Set follow movement
Description: Enables or disables default follow movement
Param1Tooltip: 0: off, 1: on
